document.full_text: steve stricker staved off seven birdies in eight holes by brandt jobe and six birdies in eight holes by matt kuchar to win the memorial tournament.
document.title: stricker survives a barrage of birdies by his competitors to win the memorial
lines_and_colors: steve stricker staved off seven birdies in eight holes by brandt jobe and six birdies in eight holes by matt kuchar to win the memorial tournament.
